hadiths.text: Anas b. Malik said :Abu Talhah asked the prophet (ﷺ) about the orphans who had inherited wine. He replied: Pour it out. He asked: May I not make vinegar of it ? He replied : No

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْخَمْرِ تُخَلَّلُ
chapter.eng-name: What has been reported regarding making vinegar with Khamr
